first large - scale dataset of questions.from sentence: First , as an effort to study the coverage of existing systems and the possibility to train jointly on different data sources via multitasking , we collected the first large - scale dataset of questions and answers based on a KB , called SimpleQuestions .

contains.from sentence: This dataset , which is presented in Section 2 , contains more than 100 k questions written by human anno-What American cartoonist is the creator of Andy Lippincott ?
